Sentencas: Systematic characterization of lanthanum tungstate (LWO) with a high La/W ratio was conducted to evaluate its suitability as a proton-conducting solid electrolyte for fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: In this study, the crystal structure, ionic and electronic transport properties of LWO with a high La/W ratio (La/W = 6.7: LWO67), which had high proton conductivity, were investigated.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: Rietveld analysis using synchrotron powder X-ray diffraction confirmed the single-phase formation of LWO67 having a cubic crystal structure with the Fm3ni space group.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: The coefficient of thermal expansion of LWO67 was also evaluated from Rietveld analysis at high temperatures.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: Thermogravimetric analysis indicated a good chemical stability of LWO67 under wet CO2 conditions.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: The observed electrical properties indicated that the proton conductivity was dominant under wet conditions below 873 K.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: The dependence of the electrical conductivity on oxygen partial pressure suggested that the electron and hole conductivities were suppressed sufficiently below 973 K.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: Based on the observed transport properties, the superiority of LWO67 applied to a proton-conducting solid electrolyte fuel cells (p-ITFCs) was also discussed.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature

Sentencas: The optimized electrolyte thickness of LWO67 was several tens of micrometers, which is more suitable than perovskite-type proton conductors such as BaZrO3 and BaCeO3 for electrode-supported fuel cells, when they are compared in terms of power generation efficiency.
Titulo: Structural and transport properties of lanthanum tungstate with high La/W ratio: Suitability for proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells operating at intermediate temperature
